name: BRIGHT (sinananan)
description:
Hey guys!

Thanks for playing!

I made this for the 5th Brackeys Jam. It was a weeklong jam, but I ended up scrapping my original idea and going with this with three days to go.  I still think it turned out pretty well. 

This is a short experience about collecting light, which becomes stronger as you collect more of it, hence 'stronger together', the theme for the jam. 

Use the arrow keys to control the player. 

I'd love it if you'd leave a comment below, I really appreciate all feedback and constructive criticism.
